featured.text: By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.

definition.zh_def: 呼吸是指吸入氧氣並排出二氧化碳的生理過程。
definition.en_def: Breathing is the physiological process of inhaling oxygen and exhaling carbon dioxide.
definition.example: Breathing deeply can help reduce stress.
